purpose: The Helsinki Institute for Information Technology (HIIT) is inviting applications for Postdoctoral Fellows and Research Fellows.
evidence_sentences: The Helsinki Institute for Information Technology (HIIT) invites applications for Postdoctoral Fellows and Research Fellows.
HIIT offers a HIIT Postdoctoral Fellow position for up to three years.
For more senior candidates, HIIT offers a HIIT Research Fellow position for up to five years.
